scripts.__preinstall: cd LiaScript && npm i && npm run build:scorm1.2 && cp -r dist ../assets/scorm1.2
scripts.build:assets: npm run clean &&npm run asset:scorm1.2 && npm run asset:web
scripts.asset:web: cd LiaScript && npm i && npm run build:base && cp -r dist ../dist/assets/web
scripts.asset:scorm1.2: cd LiaScript && npm i && npm run build:scorm1.2 && cp -r dist ../dist/assets/scorm1.2
scripts.build: npx parcel build --target node --no-source-maps node src/index.js
